inclusion.criterion: Current use of tocilizumab IV, with a consistent interval of 4 weeks for at least 24 weeks.
inclusion.label: not_met

exclusion.criterion: A potential subject will be excluded from participation in case of a scheduled surgery in the next 20 weeks or other preplanned reasons for treatment discontinuation.
exclusion.label: unknown

exclusion.criterion: Children, pregnant women and individuals with a lack of judgement.
exclusion.label: triggers

notes: The patient is a 3-day-old Asian female infant presenting with jaundice. She has an uncomplicated pregnancy history and no family history of note.
